mapper.sql: select messages_id as messagesId, member as member, messages_time as messagesTime, a.server_id as serverId, a.scripts_id as scriptsId, c.monitor_name as monitorName, a.groups_id as groupsId, severtity_id as severtityId, email as email, mobile as mobile, ding as ding, alarm_count as alarmCount, weixin as weixin, messages as messages, b.ip_address as ipAddress from monitor_messages a, cmdb_resource_server b, monitor_scripts c WHERE 1 = 1 and a.server_id = b.server_id and a.scripts_id = c.scripts_id
mapper.select:
select substr(messages_time,1,10) as messagesTime , count(*) as cnt from monitor_messages where 1=1
and mobile != "" and mobile is not NULL
and ding != "" and ding is not NULL
and weixin != "" and weixin is not NULL
and email != "" and email is not NULL
and messages_time > #{start} and messages_time < #{end} group by 1 order by messages_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into monitor_messages( messages_id, member, messages_time, server_id, scripts_id, groups_id, severtity_id, email, mobile, ding, weixin, alarm_count, messages ) values( #{messagesId}, #{member}, #{messagesTime}, #{serverId}, #{scriptsId}, #{groupsId}, #{severtityId}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{ding}, #{weixin}, #{alarmCount}, #{messages} )
